name: K-Y Liquibeads Vaginal Moisturizer Lubricant, 6 count

reviews.name: K-Y Liquibeads Vaginal Moisturizer Lubricant, 6 count
reviews.reviewText: It was a great product to use but make sure you pick up panty liners with it or it will make them stiff. The only thing is the Internet said it was in stores but I could never find it in the store I had to buy it online while I was at walmart
reviews.title: Great to use had to find

reviews.name: K-Y Liquibeads Vaginal Moisturizer Lubricant, 6 count
reviews.reviewText:
This product works!!! I inserted about an hour before going to bed and OH BOY!! You wont be disappointed!!! Does not drip out. Makes things VERY comfortable.
I received mine for FREE from smiley360.com in exchange for my review and opinion.
I love these KY liquibeads and will definatley be buying them. A+++
reviews.title: Now that's a smooth ride!!!

reviews.name: K-Y Liquibeads Vaginal Moisturizer Lubricant, 6 count
reviews.reviewText: Very good. You should carry it in your stores
reviews.title: KY

reviews.name: K-Y Liquibeads Vaginal Moisturizer Lubricant, 6 count
reviews.reviewText:
Worked fine, but individual beads are hard to open; I need scissors for it.
Also, I need to dip the bead-plus-applicator in something creamy to make insertion easier. I'm using Wamart's Eucerin moisturizer for that purpose; wrote to KY company if that were safe for internal use, but they never answered, even though I included list of ingredients.

Now my GP recommends cocoanut suppositries instead.
reviews.title: KY Liquibeads
